text:
(Is she asleep?
 Or could it be that she's not feeling well...)

Huh!? No, it's a misunderstanding!
I was just worried because you were sleeping here──

You were sleeping on the sofa.
I got worried that you might not be feeling well.

N-No, that's not it... I just wanted to take a short break
and when I sat down, I suddenly felt exhausted...

You're okay.
If nothing's wrong with Nichika, then that's good.

You've been under a lot of stress, so maybe you're
just tired. You've been working really hard, Nichika.

For now, it's better to go back to your room.
Make sure to get some rest.

Ah, yes... Wow, my body feels so stiff
from sleeping in a weird position...
